EmailTemplate.description: Used to introduce July 2017 release functionality in the Community
EmailTemplate.name: Release Update: July 2017
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K Community July 2017 Release Notes - Revised
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
We are very excited to share July 2017 Release notes! There's a lot of new and cool functionality at your disposal to help you be the best 10K Expert possible and provide our Clients with outstanding quality and service.
Some quick highlights are below but check out the full set of information in the July 2017 Release Notes Knowledge Article.
Time Cards
You are now able to associate your time entries with a specific Story and Task from the Timecard page.
Expert to Expert Feedback Launch!
10K Way now provides the ability for our experts to provide feedback on colleagues.
10K Way Training Program
Now available for all Experts including new team members. Let us know if there is a team member who does not have access and we'll set them up. We're looking for 100% of 10K Experts to complete the course.
Bug fix on profiles
Weâ€™ve fixed a bug in the Community around Profiles that did not allow Experts to edit.
Let us know your thoughts and questions. We truly appreciate your feedback!
Thanks,
Diane
Diane Shotton
VP Client Services
10K Advisors
